colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I DPAL GYIS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,MANGGA LAm, ,` TSUL 'DI TSE LDAN BSOD NAMS GUNG GI SHOG ,DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG GRAGS PA RGYA MTSO YIS, ,CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL BA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE PAR DU LEGS PAR BSGRUBS, ,RNAMS SAD 'DIS MTSON DUS GSUM DGE TSOGS MTHUS, , TSE RABS KUN TU DAL 'BYOR RTEN BRGYUD DE, ,THEG MCHOG BLA MAS DGYES BZHIN RJES BZUNG NAS, ,SA LAM BGROD PA MYUR DU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG , ,,
